title: How to Prepare Potato Dextrose Agar (PDA) using Fresh Potatoes (Part 1/4)

subtasks: Gathering Ingredients
Preparing the Media
Sterilizing the Media
Using an Autoclave

tasks.task: Preparing Potata Dextrose Agar (PDA) would encompass:

subtasks: Weighing fresh potatoes (50 grams)
Peeling fresh potatoes (with a knife)
Chopping fresh potatoes into small pieces
Boiling chopped potatoes in water
Squeezing soft potatoes to extract liquid
Measuring and adding 5 grams of dextrose
Measuring and adding 5 grams of agar
Stirring the mixture to dissolve dextrose and agar
Assembling the autoclave
Placing the prepared medium container inside
Closing the autoclave and ensuring seals
Setting correct sterilization parameters (e.g., pressure and temperature)
Monitoring the sterilization process
Cooling the autoclave after sterilization.
Gather 50 grams of fresh potatoes
Peel the potatoes using a knife
Cut the potatoes into small pieces
Boil the chopped potatoes in water
Squeeze the mashed potatoes to extract liquid
Mix 5 grams of dextrose and 5 grams of agar into the potato liquid
Stir the mixture well until all ingredients are combined
Assemble an autoclave
Place the prepped medium container into the autoclave
Close the autoclave and confirm proper sealing
Select appropriate sterilization settings (e.g., 15 pounds pressure, 121°C for 15 minutes)
Monitor the sterilization process
Allow the autoclave to cool before opening.
After sterilization, transfer the medium to a clean container (but not necessarily a part of the main task).
Peeling and chopping fresh potatoes, measuring and mixing ingredients, and sterilizing the mixture using an autoclave.

Considering the need to boil the potatoes and then get liquid, subtasks 4-6 involve mixing and gaining knowledge of the process. However, how much detail is needed. The final answer might simply list all these as subtasks under one MAINTASK.

Hence, MAINTASK of Preparing Potato Dextrose Agar, with subtasks related to those steps.

subtasks: Weigh 50 grams of fresh potatoes
Peel the potatoes using a knife
Cut the potatoes into small pieces
Boil the chopped potatoes in water until soft
Extract liquid from the boiled potatoes by squeezing the solids
Measure 5 grams of dextrose and add it to the potato liquid
Measure 5 grams of agar and add it to the mixture
Stir the mixture until ingredients are well combined and agar is dissolved
